title: Google\Cloud\Dialogflow\V2\AnnotatedMessagePart
name: AnnotatedMessagePart
description:
Represents a part of a message possibly annotated with an entity. The part can be an entity or purely a part of the message between two entities or message start/end.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.AnnotatedMessagePart

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.text
params.description: A part of a message possibly annotated with an entity.

params.name: data.entity_type
params.description: The Dialogflow system entity type of this message part. If this is empty, Dialogflow could not annotate the phrase part with a system entity.

params.name: data.formatted_value
params.description:
The Dialogflow system entity formatted value of this message part. For example for a system entity of type @sys.unit-currency, this may contain: 

 { "amount": 5, "currency": "USD" }

methods.description:
